title: Красовского заочно приговорили к тюрьме на Украине за слова о детях
cleaned_sentences: The court in Ukraine in absentia sentenced the former broadcasting director of the Russian -speaking channel Russia Today (RT) Anton Krasovsky by five years in prison for his words about children.
This was reported in the press service of the office of the Ukrainian Prosecutor General.
“The prosecutors proved that in 2022, convicted in one of the air of his author’s program, publicly called for heating and burning Ukrainian children.
This plot was included in Russia Today, ”the report said.
As specified in the Prosecutor General, Krasovsky was found guilty under an article on public calls for genocide.
In February 2023, the Ukrainian court had already sentenced the journalist by five years in prison.
According to the aggregate of sentences, he was now imposed a final punishment of imprisonment for five years with confiscation of property.
The phrase of Krasovsky about Ukrainian children sounded on October 23, 2022 during his conversation with writer Sergei Lukyanenko.
The writer said that in childhood in Ukraine, children told him that "Ukraine is occupied by the Muscovites."
In response to this, the ex-director called for the drowning such children, "to score them in a hut and burn."
Earlier, Krasovsky commented on rumors about the connection with the deceased actor of the Black Theater Theater.
